Half-Time Talk: Ini Pidato Lampard yang Menginspirasi Skuad Chelsea Wujudkan Comeback Impresif
06 Nov 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Frank Lampard berhasil menginspirasi skuad Chelsea untuk mewujudkan comeback impresif saat menjamu Ajax Amsterdam, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Duel Liga Champions itu akan selalu dikenang sebagai salah satu yang paling menarik.
Pertandingan ini penuh kejutan. The Blues tertinggal 1-3 saat turun minum, situasi yang buruk. Anehnya, Ajax hanya mencatatkan satu shot on target meski mencetak tiga gol itu - dua di antaranya dihitung sebagai gol bunuh diri Chelsea.
Lalu, skor itu berubah jadi 1-4 hanya 10 menit setelah babak kedua dimulai. Chelsea kian kesulitan, tapi mental mereka sudah siap berkat pidato Lampard di ruang ganti pada jeda paruh waktu.
Apa yang dikatakan legenda Chelsea ini? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!

Half-Time Talk: This is Lampard's Speech that Inspires the Chelsea Squad to Make an Impressive Comeback
Nov 6 2019, 08:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Frank Lampard managed to inspire the Chelsea squad to realize an impressive comeback when entertaining Ajax Amsterdam, Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs. The Champions League duel will always be remembered as one of the most interesting.
This match is full of surprises. The Blues left behind 1-3 at halftime, a bad situation. Surprisingly, Ajax only recorded one shot on target despite scoring three goals - two of which counted as Chelsea's own goal.
Then, the score changed to 1-4 just 10 minutes after the second half began. Chelsea are increasingly struggling, but they are mentally prepared thanks to Lampard's speech in the dressing room at half-time.
